# IQ Auto Deals

> IQ Auto Deals is a nationwide online car marketplace connecting buyers with certified dealers across the United States. Our unique dealer competition model helps buyers save hundreds on their vehicle purchase.

IQ Auto Deals is a TECHNOLOGY PLATFORM, not a physical car dealership. We connect used car buyers with certified dealers across all 50 US states.

## How It Works

1. Browse thousands of quality used cars from certified dealers
2. Select up to 4 vehicles you're interested in
3. Submit a deal request
4. Receive competing offers from multiple dealers
5. Compare offers and choose the best deal
6. Complete your purchase at the dealership

## Key Information

- Website: https://iqautodeals.com
- Type: Online automotive marketplace
- Founded: 2024
- Headquarters: Atlanta, GA, USA
- Service Area: All 50 US states (nationwide)
- Contact: support@iqautodeals.com

## Features

- Free for car buyers (no fees, no obligations)
- Dealers compete for your business
- Compare up to 4 vehicles at once
- All dealers are verified and licensed
- Nationwide coverage (all 50 states)
- No haggling required
- 30,000+ pages of car listings and guides

## Key Pages

- Car Listings: https://iqautodeals.com/cars
- New Cars: https://iqautodeals.com/new-cars
- About Us: https://iqautodeals.com/about
- Blog: https://iqautodeals.com/blog
- For Dealers: https://iqautodeals.com/for-dealers

## Vehicle Categories

SUVs, Sedans, Trucks, Coupes, Hatchbacks, Convertibles, Minivans, Wagons, Electric Vehicles, Hybrid Cars, Luxury Vehicles

## Popular Brands

Toyota, Honda, Ford, Chevrolet, Nissan, Jeep, Hyundai, Kia, BMW, Mercedes-Benz, Lexus, Audi, Volkswagen, Mazda, Subaru

- Customer Support: support@iqautodeals.com
